title: I have blackscreen on league
body: I accidentently made the resolution more then what my monitor can handle on league and now its just black screen saying its not sized and i cant see my menu so i cant change it back in game which is the only way to do it. i reinstalled too and it didnt work . Ive tried on both my accounts and i got nothing. i can be in game too like the game runs just cant see the game

replies.body: To help dig into this a bit more, can you provide any screenshots or error messages you are receiving?  The black client screen you are experiencing is usually due to a connection problem and not resolution.  Getting a closer look at this can help determine the issue you're having.

I dont have any screen shot. And no it is the resolution i did it last night in game and i had to leave it. Instead of the champ load screen i get a a black screen and it says something mhz for the resolution. and in mid on writing this i tried to log on to see the exact wording of what i see. and i got thru this time idk what happened to get me thru
